Enumeration Type Documentation

enum GtvQuadrature

Quadrature types built in to GTV.

Enumerator:
GTV_QUADRATURE_KEAST_1  Keast four point rule
GTV_QUADRATURE_ZIENKIEWICZ_4  Zienkiewicz four point rule
GTV_QUADRATURE_ZIENKIEWICZ_5  Zienkiewicz five point rule

Function Documentation

gint gtv_quadrature_rule_compute ( GtvQuadratureRule *  q,
GtvTetrahedron *  t,
GtsPoint *  p,
gint  nh,
gint  nr,
gint  nt 
)

Generate a quadrature rule for the integration of functions with a singularity on a GtvTetrahedron, using (something like) the algorithm of Khayat and Wilton, `Numerical evaluation of singular and near-singular potential integrals', IEEE Transactions on Antennas and Propagation, 53(10):3180-3190, 2005, http://dx.doi.org/10.1109/TAP.2005.856342

Parameters:
q a GtvQuadratureRule;
t a GtvTetrahedron to integrate over;
p the field point for evaluation of the integral;
nh number of vertical sampling points on t;
nr number of radial sampling points on each slice of t;
nt number of transverse sampling points on each slice of t;
Returns:
GTV_SUCCESS on success.

gint gtv_quadrature_rule_free ( GtvQuadratureRule *  q  ) 

Free a previously allocated GtvQuadratureRule, releasing all associated memory.

Parameters:
q the GtvQuadratureRule to be freed.
Returns:
GTV_SUCCESS on success.

gint gtv_quadrature_rule_interp_point ( GtvQuadratureRule *  q,
GtsPoint *  p1,
GtsPoint *  p2,
GtsPoint *  p3,
GtsPoint *  p4,
gint  i,
GtsPoint *  p 
)

Interpolate a position between four points using a quadrature rule for tetrahedra.

Parameters:
q a GtvQuadratureRule;
p1 first vertex;
p2 second vertex;
p3 third vertex;
p4 fourth vertex;
i index of node in q;
p interpolated position.
Returns:
GTV_SUCCESS on success.

gint gtv_quadrature_rule_interp_scalar ( GtvQuadratureRule *  q,
gdouble  v1,
gdouble  v2,
gdouble  v3,
gdouble  v4,
gint  i,
gdouble *  v 
)

Interpolate a scalar between four points using a quadrature rule for tetrahedra.

Parameters:
q a GtvQuadratureRule;
v1 scalar value at the first vertex;
v2 scalar value at the second vertex;
v3 scalar value at the third vertex;
v4 scalar value at the fourth vertex;
i index of node in q;
v interpolated value.
Returns:
GTV_SUCCESS on success.

the new rule.

gint gtv_quadrature_rule_select ( GtvQuadratureRule *  q,
GtvQuadrature  quadrature 
)

Select a pre-computed quadrature rule for integration on a tetrahedron.

Parameters:
q a GtvQuadratureRule
quadrature the rule, of type GtvQuadrature
Returns:
GTV_SUCCESS on success.
